General.Name: Xinjiang Tianshan Animal Husbandry Bio-engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Tianshan Animal Husbandry Bio-engineering Co., Ltd. engages in cattle and sheep breeding activities in China. The company engages in the improvement of cattle and sheep varieties, relying on biological genetic technology to provide embryo and other genetic materials and related services for the livestock industry. It is also involved in breeding, fattening, slaughtering, processing, and selling beef cattle; and slaughtering beef and mutton products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Changji, China.
General.Address: Tianshan Biological Breeding Indus Park, Changji, China, 831100
